Generation I.Red: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
Generation I.Yellow: Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.
Generation I.Stadium: Lives on beaches and seashores. If a pincer falls off, a new, stronger pincer grows back in its place.

Generation II.Gold: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
Generation II.Silver: The pincers break off easily. If it loses a pincer, it somehow becomes incapable of walking sideways.
Generation II.Crystal: If it is unable to find food, it will absorb nutrients by swallowing a mouthful of sand.
Generation II.Stadium 2: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) The pincers break off easily. If it loses a pincer, it somehow becomes incapable of walking sideways. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)
